text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Tokushima. == Candidates == *Kamon Iizumi back by national LDP and Komeito. *Atsushi Amou for the JCP. *Taiji Kishimoto, ex-prefectoral MP, back by the local section of LDP. == Results == http://shingetsunewsagency.com/2019/04/13/conservative-landslide-in-unified- local-elections/ == References == Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:Politics of Tokushima Prefecture
title: 2019 Tokushima gubernatorial election
